dataset.title: GBIF Occurrence Download 0046453-251025141854904
dataset.abstract: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "SpeciesKey is Antheraea polyphemus", "HasCoordinate is True" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 3 records from M.Scott Griggs Personal Lepidoptera Collection 2 records from Museum of Southwestern Biology, Division of Arthropods 214 records from Entomology Division, Yale Peabody Museum 3 records from State of Vermont Forest Biology Lab 6 records from Mohonk Preserve Historical Observational Biodiversity Data 2 records from Entomologische Sammlung (ETHZ-ENT) of Eidgenössische Technische Hochschule Zürich 1 records from NABU|naturgucker 48 records from Arizona State University Hasbrouck Insect Collection 4 records from New Mexico State Collection of Arthropods 7 records from Stuart M. Fullerton Collection of Arthropods (UCFC), University of Central Florida 36 records from William F. Barr Entomological Museum 18 records from Digitalización y Sistematización de las Colecciones Biológicas Nacionales del Instituto de Biología, UNAM (CNIN) 36 records from Denver Museum of Nature & Science - Entomology 29 records from R. M. Bohart Museum of Entomology 105 records from C.P. Gillette Museum of Arthropod Diversity 17 records from Records of Giant Silkmoths (Saturniinae) from Vermont Collections and 2002-2007 18 records from CNIN/Lepidoptera 66 records from International Barcode of Life project (iBOL) 3 records from UAM Insect Observations (Arctos) 18 records from Catálogo sistemático de las superfamilias Mimallonoidea y Bombycoidea de México 34 records from Museum of Comparative Zoology, Harvard University 1 records from Biodiversidad de la Sierra Tarahumara. Lepidoptera: Mimallonoidea, Lasiocampoidea, Bombycoidea y Pyraloidea 22 records from Recent Invertebrates Specimens 110 records from University of Minnesota Insect Collection 4 records from Observation.org, Nature data from around the World 23 records from CAS Entomology (ENT) 6 records from RBINS Lepidoptera collection 6 records from Mississippi Entomological Museum 57 records from University of Texas, Biodiversity Center, Entomology Collection (UTIC) 2 records from 2007-2022_nibr_simpl_in 142 records from The Lepidopterists' Society Season Summary 3 records from UCM Entomology Collection 89 records from University of Georgia Collection of Arthropods 3 records from Insectarium de Montréal (IMQC) 6 records from Historic Butterfly Specimens in the UVM Zadock Thompson Natural History Collection Digitized for the Vermont Butterfly Atlas 9 records from University of Delaware Insect Research Collection 1 records from Illinois Natural History Survey Insect Collection 10 records from Clemson University Arthropod Collection 39 records from University of British Columbia - Spencer Entomological Collection (UBCZ) 35 records from Academy of Natural Sciences Entomology Collection 6 records from RBINS DaRWIN 35 records from Royal Saskatchewan Museum - Entomology 1 records from MPM Milwaukee Public Museum Invertebrate Zoology Collection 65 records from University of Alberta E.
